description: Normalized brand mapping for canned drinks page. Filters deprecated products and remaps WTF vendor products to correct brands.

excludedProducts.title: White Rabbit Kratom Cans
excludedProducts.reason: Duplicate - covered by White Rabbit brand

excludedProducts.title: Tea Time Kratom Cans
excludedProducts.reason: Duplicate - covered by Tea Time brand

Crank Cannabis Beverages.reason: Should be standalone brand, not under WTF vendor

Lumenade Cans.reason: Lumenade is a brand with multiple flavor variants

implementationNotes: Brand normalization happens in JavaScript on page load
Products are fetched from Storefront API and filtered client-side
Excluded products are skipped during brand grouping
WTF vendor products are remapped based on product title
Zero-price products are automatically filtered out
Brands with no valid products are removed from display
lightspeedSyncNotes: Vendor names in Shopify are NOT modified to preserve Lightspeed sync
All SKUs and variant IDs remain unchanged
Remapping happens only in the front-end template logic
No new products or variants are created
